item.title: Pete Hegseth heads to Capitol Hill for fiery hearing on his record, plans to shake up Pentagon
item.description: Pete Hegseth is set to take the hot seat before the Senate Armed Services Committee on Tuesday in a hearing that is sure to break out into fireworks.

item.title: Pedophiles could see death penalty under new House GOP bill: 'Taken off the streets permanently'
item.description: Rep. Anna Paulina Luna spoke with Fox News Digital about a slate of legislation she is unveiling in this Congress targeting child sex predators.
